reference.title: SendMsg : To send a CAN frame

section.title: Description
section.p: This function will put the message on the CAN bus. The message structure STCAN_MSG will be filled with ID, length, frame format and data. Big/Little endian packing will be taken care if it is a database message.

section.title: Returns
section.p: Zero on successful transmisstion. Non-zero value on failure.
